name: Iris Waldorf Nature Table Seasonal 35" Playsilk
description:
Hand dyed with professional-grade acid dyes, this play silk is designed to withstand sunlight and being handled every day. 35" x 35", this luscious play silk is perfect for your nature table, your play stand or as a companion to your son or daughter. With endless creative uses, this play silk is the perfect open-ended toy to bring out the inner artist and creative spirit within.

I do my best to capture each individual play silk's color and patterns, however colors vary from monitor and computer. If you have any questions about the play silk or the color, please message me!

I'm happy to work with you to create smaller/larger silks or to find the perfect color combinations. Just message me!

*** Please Note *** This listing is ONLY for the silk, not anything pictured with it (basket, fairies, gnomes, spirits, etc.)

name: Sherwood Forest 4oz Corriedale Hand Dyed Wool Top
description:
It's important to surround those you love with beautiful things that make you inspired... but don't forget you, too!

This gorgeous, 4oz braid of corriedale wool top is perfect for spinning or felting.  Gently hand painted by me with professional-quality acid dyes, designed to give you vibrant and long-lasting colors, this wool is a pleasure to feel and to create with!

Looking for a custom colorway? Contact me for info on different fibers, colorways or to create your very own art batt, full of texture, color and fun!
Tags: Waldorf Cocoon, handmade, eco-friendly, wool, roving, spinning, felting, fiber, corriedale, hand painted, hand dyed, dyed

name: Sun Ray Waldorf Seasonal Nature Table 35" Play Silk
description:
Hand dyed with professional-grade acid dyes, this play silk is designed to withstand sunlight and being handled every day. 35" x 35", this luscious gold play silk is perfect for your nature table, your play stand or as a companion to your son or daughter. With endless creative uses, this play silk is the perfect open-ended toy to bring out the inner artist and creative spirit within.

I do my best to capture each individual play silk's color and patterns, however colors vary from monitor and computer. If you have any questions about the play silk or the color, please message me!

This silk does have some tiny, dark spots in the corner, which is why it's priced a little differently than the others. Nothing's wrong with the silk - it's just a result of my dye process and how the silk took the dye.

I'm happy to work with you to create smaller/larger silks or to find the perfect color combinations. Just message me!

*** Please Note *** This listing is ONLY for the silk, not anything pictured with it (basket, fairies, gnomes, spirits, etc.)
